thread.title: U.S. Senate Democrats seek bill to aid Puerto Rico fiscal crisis
thread.title_full: U.S. Senate Democrats seek bill to aid Puerto Rico fiscal crisis | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: U.S. Senate Democrats seek bill to aid Puerto Rico fiscal crisis
text:
WASHINGTON, July 15 Democrats in the U.S. Senate on Wednesday unveiled legislation they are pushing to give Puerto Rican entities the same access to Chapter 9 bankruptcy protections enjoyed by similar entities in the United States.
Senator Charles Schumer, the No. 3 ranking Senate Democrat, and Senator Richard Blumenthal said they were trying to win the support of Republicans, who control the Senate.
(Reporting by Richard Cowan ; Editing by Will Dunham )
